title: synchronization problem
body: Hello I have a problem with the synchronization of my node it puts me  Syncing: state healing in progress while it returns me the synced to 100%.
I forgot to mention that I'm running on ubuntu 20.04 with geth 1.11.0

logs


```
INFO [10-06|13:45:08.677] Syncing: state healing in progress       accounts=8372@396.48KiB slots=4609@376.85KiB codes=19@148.48KiB nodes=70639@21.42MiB pending=44564
```
It is syncing -- it has managed to sync only 70K nodes, totalling 21Mb. This is a very low figure, usually somewhere in the millions are needed to finish the heal-phase. 

Where does it say `synced to 100%` ? How long was it since you started the geth process?

the process works for days at a time it displays synced=100% and the current time it displays age=1m2s 
```
Oct 06 14:01:31 eth2 geth[43896]: INFO [10-06|14:01:31.681] Imported new block headers               count=1    elapsed=119.482ms   number=15,688,922 hash=f76aeb..4b6332 age=1m8s
```
the value of the pending goes down slowly
I've just checked the value of nodes is slowly increasing I'm currently at 126K

`age=1m8s` --this means that the block header it just imported is `1m8s` old. That doesn't mean that the sync is 'done', only that it just moved the so called "pivot block" ahead to a very recent block. 

Can you provide a log where it says something about `100%`?
How long was it since you started the geth process?

```
Oct 06 12:58:51 eth2 geth[5017]: INFO [10-06|12:58:51.372] Syncing: state download in progress      synced=100.00% state=208.12GiB accounts=190,842,054@42.28GiB slots=808,518,456@161.60GiB codes=690,193@4.23GiB    eta=-2m13.607s
```
I restarted for the last time the service Oct 06 13:09:10 eth2 geth[43896]: INFO [10-06|13:09:10.503] Block synchronisation started

Ah, ok. 
So, the logs are a bit confusing. See https://geth.ethereum.org/docs/interface/sync-modes 
It's kind of :

1.    download and verify headers
2.a   download block bodies and receipts.
2.b  In parallel, download raw state data and build state trie
3 .   heal state trie to account for newly arriving data


The `Syncing: state download in progress` is `2.b`, it reached 100% at `12:58`. So that phase is done. 

After that, it commenced with `Syncing: state healing` (which is `3`). It is progressing nicely, give it some hours, sometimes up to 12 hours of healing. Just let it be. 

If you need to provide more logs in the future, use triple-backticks to style a chunk of text.
Feel free to reopen if it doesn't work out
ok thanks I'll see an update tomorrow morning and keep you informed
hello little point on the situation the node is currently at nodes=2,255,712 would it be possible to accelerate this step I have another node that works as needed
